mapper.insert: insert into zk_public_course_option(termNo, campusId, cNo, optionHtml) values(#{termNo},#{campus.id},#{cNo},#{optionHtml})
mapper.select: select zk_public_course_option.pcoId, zk_public_course_option.termNo, zk_public_course_option.cNo, zk_public_course_option.optionHtml, zk_campus.campusId, zk_campus.campusName from zk_public_course_option left join zk_campus on zk_public_course_option.campusId = zk_campus.campusId where pcoId=#{id}

select zk_public_course_option.pcoId, zk_public_course_option.termNo, zk_public_course_option.cNo, zk_public_course_option.optionHtml, zk_campus.campusId, zk_campus.campusName from zk_public_course_option left join zk_campus on zk_public_course_option.campusId = zk_campus.campusId where termNo=#{termNo} and cNo=#{cNo} and zk_public_course_option.campusId=#{campus.id}
